greeting.title: Hi there! Looking for a food substitute?
greeting.subtitle: Just tell me what ingredient you have or don't have, and I'll suggest tasty alternatives.

suggestions.sugar: What can I use instead of sugar?

delete.title: Delete Chat Session?
